atomica.objects
Class GameSituation

java.lang.Object
  atomica.objects.GameSituation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GameSituation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class holds information about a certain game situation, like the arrangement of tokens on the board. It is used for displaying the situation on the UI as well as for calculations.

Author:
Georg Ludewig
See Also:
